column2: A Battle Wizard Lord with access to Lore of Fire will become available to be recruited from any settlement.
A Battle Wizard Lord with access to Lore of Light will become available to be recruited from any settlement.
A Battle Wizard Lord with access to Lore of Beasts will become available to be recruited from any settlement.
What two-handed axes lack in elegance, they make up for in brutal, armour-shattering force.
